# constraints

**Type Property**

A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.

## Declaration

```swift
static var constraints: NSView.Invalidations.Constraints { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this invalidation type to set [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/needsUpdateConstraints] so that a change in property value triggers the containing view to update constraints.

## Types of Invalidations

- **display**: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.
- **intrinsicContentSize**: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.
- **layout**: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.
- **restorableState**: A change that invalidates the restorable state of the view.
